title: [Bug]: 2.0.10 in Ubuntu/Gnome creates additional icon in task bar
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

After upgrade 2.0.9 -> 2.0.10, now when I launch app from pinned icon, app starts but adds and responds on new generic icon in the taskbar. So now I have two icons - one is pinned, another is really running app.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.10

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Just upgraded 2.0.9 -> 2.0.10
Ubuntu 25.04

Thank you.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
